section.title: Valve.VR.SteamVR_Action_Pose_Source_Map< Source > Class Template Reference

para.para: Boolean actions are either true or false. There is an onStateUp and onStateDown event for the rising and falling edge.

listitem.para: Sets all pose (and skeleton) actions to use the specified universe origin without going through the sourcemap indexer

section.title: Detailed Description
